body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, attorney. Lexington, Kentucky native. Married to Ellen Pearce Bodley. Father of Hugh S. Bodley, Ann J. Bodley, Martha Bodley, Pearce Bodley, Henry Bodley, William C. Bodley, Temple Bodley, Stanard Bodley, and Ellen Pearce Bodley. Owned four enslaved persons in 1850. Practiced law in partnership with John G. Simrall.
